ValidationRule.description: Requires a completed Content Studio project to have the "Final PDF URL" field populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "01230000000wS4x" && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2018-01-01" ) ) && NOT( ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Digital Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Webinar") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "State-Specific Webinar") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Lunch & Learn Webinar") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Video") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Custom Roundtables") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Editorial Roundtables") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Lead-Gen Poll") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Standard Leads") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Filtered Leads") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Account Based Marketing") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Two-Step Nurture") || ISPICKVAL(Project_Type__c , "Multi-Touch Nurture") ) && ISPICKVAL( Project_Stage__c , "Completed") && ISBLANK( Final_PDF_URL__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Create a public link to the final PDF attached to this project's Files and paste that link here. If there is no final PDF, input "n/a" here.
